title: Pickems not updating?
body:
Woke up and checked my Pickems at about 11am EST or so, and found myself pleasantly surprised to have 38 points. But when I went to the league client to complete the mission and get my icon, it still has me listed as not having completed the mission(which has a threshold of 34 points)

Will I have to wait until the end of Worlds to get it, or is it just taking an inordinate amount of time to update my progress?

replies.body: Hey, grats!  There's currently a delay with pick em's mission completing for some players.  Give it some time, and the update should pull through and complete for you.  Hang tight!
